Component Builder Information

Components

Do you have questions about how to use the Illinois Toolkit Web Components? Here are some tools to help you build them and experiment with how they look.

Helpful Links

  • The Web Implementation Guidelines Group Web Theme page, which has information about the group
  • The Illinois Theme for Wordpress

Run into an issue?

Please create a Github issue so we can look into it.
